title: How To Instrument a React Native App To Send OTel Signals
author: Jonathan Munz; Florencia Acosta
description: Instrument a React Native app to send data to any OpenTelemetry backend over OTLP-HTTP, including automatic instrumentation, custom tracing and tracking navigation flows.
cntitle: 如何为 React Native 应用添加工具以发送 OTel 信号
cndescription: 为 React Native 应用添加监控功能，以便通过 OTLP-HTTP 将数据发送到任何 OpenTelemetry 后端，包括自动监控、自定义追踪和导航流程追踪。
